title: Everything You Need to Know About Mars in Pisces

steps.title: Mars in Pisces makes you laid back, gentle, and empathetic.
steps.content: Mars in Pisces makes you laid back, gentle, and empathetic. In astrology, Mars influences your energy, motivations, and passions . If your Mars is in Pisces, love, kindness, and peace are what push you forward. You’re a gentle giant who uses your creative mind and sensitive spirit to make the world a better place. [1] X Research source Your Mars in Pisces placement makes you very dreamy and imaginative. This is because Pisces is ruled by Jupiter, the planet of expansion and growth, as well as Neptune, the planet of dreams and spirituality.

steps.title: Easygoing
steps.content: Easygoing As a Mars in Pisces, you float in the waters of life and simply let the waves carry you where they may. You’re content to go along with your friends' plans or transitions at work without putting up a fight—you see no point in trying to control the world around you. While you can seem unaffected by Mars’ assertive energy, you understand that the Universe is the one at the wheel and you’re confident that it’ll let things happen to you as they should. Pisces is a mutable sign that makes you adaptable and versatile. You love change and easily find your footing in new situations. Having this placement doesn’t mean you aren’t driven or hold strong values and opinions. When you set your mind to something, you’re just more likely to let your path unfold in front of you instead of making a concrete plan. You might find yourself sacrificing your wants and needs to maintain your zen-like aura. While you’re often happy to do this, remember that it’s not a bad thing to put yourself first , too.

steps.title: Compassionate
steps.content: Compassionate Empathy is your superpower as a Mars in Pisces. You feel every emotion deeply and are extremely sensitive to others’ feelings. If you have one goal in life, it’s to ensure friends, family, and strangers are happy and healthy. So, you use Mars’ passionate energy to fight for causes close to your heart, like volunteering at animal shelters, protesting for equal rights, or raising money for cancer research. [2] X Research source Pisces is a water sign that gives you your ocean-deep emotions, compassionate nature, and psychic-like intuition.

steps.title: Creative
steps.content: Creative With Mars’ fiery energy coursing through your veins, you need to get out all of your emotions through art. You find solace in painting dreamy landscapes, playing super-charged guitar riffs, or snapping sullen self-portraits. Channeling your restless thoughts into creative pursuits helps you focus on your goal to better the world instead of getting lost in your daydreams. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Peaceful
steps.content: Peaceful Your sweet, Piscean energy squashes Mars’ more aggressive traits. You are the mediator in your social circles, using your gentle aura and need for unity to defuse arguments and stressful situations. While you tend to avoid conflict and can seem passive, your true strength is forgiveness. You understand why people do the things they do, so you don’t hold grudges when a friend, family member, or coworker hurts your feelings or wrongs you. Your need for harmony and desire to cause no harm can sometimes backfire and hurt you. Recognize that it’s okay to protect your peace and set boundaries about your wants and needs. Your spirituality and alone time are very important to you as a Pisces Mars. Remember to heal your soul by meditating , walking in nature, making art, or reading.

steps.title: Passive aggressive
steps.content: Passive aggressive Your easygoing and peaceful nature can sometimes make you feel guilty about feeling angry or upset. So, you tend to bottle up your emotions and opt for passive-aggressive jabs instead of explaining how you feel. When things get too much, you might lash out at your friends and family. [4] X Research source Expressing your emotions can feel scary, but it’s an important part of maintaining healthy relationships. When something bothers you, calmly and clearly communicate how you feel using “I” statements . For instance, you might say, “I feel unappreciated when you don’t check in on me during the week. I’d appreciate it if you’d call or text me during the day to see how I’m doing.”

steps.title: Mars in Pisces men are caring and devoted.
steps.content: Mars in Pisces men are caring and devoted. If you’re a Mars in Pisces man, you’re incredibly in tune with your emotions. You have a sensitive soul and want to help everyone you meet. Mars’ passionate energy makes you extremely driven to achieve your goals, which are usually tied to charitable and humanitarian causes. [5] X Research source In the romance department, you’ll do anything to make your partner happy. So, you’re looking for someone who’s just as committed, thoughtful, and affectionate as you!

steps.title: Mars in Pisces women are generous and sensitive.
steps.content: Mars in Pisces women are generous and sensitive. As a Mars in Pisces woman, you’re always ready to help with a supportive hand and a warm smile. You feel every emotion intensely and are called to channel your feelings into helping others. So, you go out of your way to lift people up, donating your time and money to make the world a kinder place. In a romantic partner, you’re looking for someone who gives just as much as you do. You want a sensitive and romantic partner who sweeps you off your feet and understands your highs and lows.

steps.title: Mars in Pisces natives are attracted to sensitive and romantic partners.
steps.content: Mars in Pisces natives are attracted to sensitive and romantic partners. As a Mars in Pisces, you’re looking for someone who listens to you, feels your deep emotions, and sticks by your side through thick and thin. While devotion is a must, you want the classic, fairy tale romance—someone who makes your heart race and butterflies flit in your stomach. [6] X Research source You swoon over partners who write you sappy poetry, whisper sweet nothings, and carry you off into the sunset. Reader Poll: We asked 707 wikiHow readers who are Pisces signs about relationship deal breakers, and 62% of them agreed that their biggest deal breaker is someone who lies . [Take Poll]

steps.title: A Mars in Pisces placement makes you a loving and faithful partner.
steps.content: A Mars in Pisces placement makes you a loving and faithful partner. With Mars’ passionate energy, you happily give every part of yourself to your significant other. Your devotion is unmatched and you’ll do anything for your partner, often prioritizing their wants and needs over your other responsibilities! When you have your sights set on someone, you win them over with your charming words, confident eye contact, and romantic dates.

steps.title: In the bedroom, Mars in Pisces natives are emotional and adventurous.
steps.content: In the bedroom, Mars in Pisces natives are emotional and adventurous. For things to spice up with your partner, you need to feel a spiritual and emotional connection. When your minds and bodies are in sync, you’re incredibly sensitive to your partner’s needs and make it your mission to please them. Your wants are important too, and you love playing out your deepest fantasies and desires between the sheets. [7] X Research source

steps.title: People with Mars in Pisces excel in creative and humanitarian fields.
steps.content: People with Mars in Pisces excel in creative and humanitarian fields. With your artistic talents and compassionate nature, you want your career to be meaningful and make the world a brighter, more beautiful place. So, it’s no surprise that you’d make an incredible graphic designer, writer, volunteer coordinator, or executive director of a non-profit. Whatever you choose to do, your intelligence, problem-solving skills, and empathy ensure that you reach success! [8] X Research source

steps.title: Mars in Pisces inspires you to dream big and work towards change.
steps.content: Mars in Pisces inspires you to dream big and work towards change. When the planet Mars enters the constellation of Pisces, you feel Pisces’ creative and compassionate spirit. During this transit, you might let your imagination run wild and consider new goals and possibilities for yourself. Your priorities might also shift from yourself to helping local and global humanitarian causes. Use Mars in Pisces’ energy to make even your wildest dreams come true . Write down all the steps you need to take to reach your dream and then create a schedule for yourself to check each goal off.
